content.rendered:
Easily accessed via Bekfaya’s main road, Blanc De Chene comfortably accommodates up to 200 guests indoors and 500 outdoors. Upon arrival, their professional valet service will safely park the vehicles in a designated spot, and your guests will then be escorted to an elegantly seated welcome area with live piano performance, for them to enjoy their welcome drinks.

All throughout the evening, their tailored and highly amusing musical performances, in addition to their superb catering services will then guarantee that your guests will enjoy a special dinner setting with personalized culinary delights.

With a charming surrounding panoramic view, the enchanting greenery around, the many scenic spots on location, and just the perfect breeze during Lebanon’s summer heat, your dream wedding at Blanc De Chene will certainly be magical.

Some of the facilities offered by the venue:

  • Event/Wedding coordination
  • 1 Hostess for every 50 guests
  • Fully furnished welcome drink area
  • Floral wall of fame
  • Live piano performance (in the welcome drink area)
  • 2 LCD’s installed in the Welcome Drink area & a Large LED screen in the ceremony area
  • Fake cake, real cake, and volcanoes
  • Black-wood dance floor (anti slip)
  • Full lighting and sound systems
  • DJ’s
  • And many other services…

Blanc De Chene owns its own catering services. You have the possibility to choose between a Lebanese Seated Dinner, a Set Menu, or an International Buffet.

When we visited the venue, we met the owner and manager Mr Jospeph Sayah, he was very welcoming and he explained to us what makes his venue unique. We sensed the secret of Blanc De Chene which is a high level of professionalism that turns your wedding into a unique unforgettable experience.

Whether you have too many ideas to choose from or none at all, our wedding organizers can assist to ensure you have the “just right” wedding you’ve always wanted!

A five-star infrastructure can provide comprehensive original shows, individual never before seen cakes, a poolside sunset theme with a sushi bar, a grand ballroom for 500 guests, overhead videos of the couples best moments or even a local Royal Spa honeymoon complete with a mud-bath for two.

Le Royal also specialize in VIP weddings. A few examples include Ajibola Ajimobi, the daughter of Nigerian governors Oya State whom tied the knot in Lebanon,  and another was former Miss USA Rima Fakih who wedded music producer Wassim Salibi.

content.rendered:
Nested on the bank of the ancient Lycus River (Nahr El Kalb), a two thousand years old historical and archeological site where Emperors and Kings have left their footprints, The Legend Venue is unique by definition. Incense

Guests are privileged by an exclusive site seeing view of the Historical Mamluk Bridge and the 17-Arches Roman Aqueduct, overwhelmed by the sacred beauty of the natural surrounding and swayed by the gentle breeze of the river valley that flows through our venue making it the perfect spot for legendary outdoor and indoor celebrations.

Today, its timeless majesty will enchant and delight, welcoming the most prestigious and glamorous weddings, corporate events and concerts. Our indoor space accommodates up to 1000 persons (seated dinner) and 750 persons (buffet set up) and is operational from 15 October to Mid-May. The outdoor space accommodates up to 1200 persons (seated dinner) and 800 persons (buffet set up) and is operational from 25 May to 1 October.

Only a 200-meter drive from the highway and at a close distance from the heart of Beirut, The Legend Venue wins it all.

Contact Details

“Les Grandes Arcades” indoor space fits over 200 guests; along with a breathtaking view terrace that can entertain in summer time more than 125 live barbecuing fans. As well as, an outdoor wedding venue that accommodates over 600 persons.
The place is a very high end top of the line grand establishment, meeting the unique distinguished standard of both interior context and exterior settings overtaken by well-maintained rich vine yards.

The traditional mountain rustic décor, surrounded by natural sceneries of well-maintained rich vine yards, the wild cocktails enjoyed with refined appetizers of the house, the professional presentation of art healthy meals cooked with organic ingredients and its flavoring taste, and the welcoming staff attitude make it an amazing place for one to enjoy, relax and eat its latest creations of good food.

We combine this creative energy with the classic gastronomic cooking techniques and a sense of global inspiration, while always paying homage to the ingredients themselves.
